patterns: What kinds of items are there?
What do you have in store?
responses: We sell a wide range of books including fiction, non-fiction, bestsellers, and more.
Our bookstore offers a variety of genres including fiction, non-fiction, and bestsellers.

patterns: What payment methods do you accept?
responses: We accept VISA, Mastercard, American Express, Discover, and Paypal.
We accept most major credit cards including VISA, Mastercard, American Express, and Discover, as well as Paypal.

patterns: When do I get my delivery?
responses: Delivery usually takes 2-4 business days.
Shipping typically takes 2-4 business days.
Why did the book go to therapy? Because it had too many issues!
Why did the librarian get kicked off the plane? Because it was overbooked!
Our prices vary depending on the book. You can check the prices on our website.
The prices of our books range depending on the genre and edition. Feel free to browse our website for more details.
Our online bookstore is open 24/7 for browsing and purchases.
You can shop with us anytime, day or night, as our online bookstore is open 24/7.

patterns: Can you recommend a fiction book?
I'm looking for a good fiction book.
responses: Sure! Here are some popular fiction books: 'To Kill a Mockingbird' by Harper Lee, 'The Great Gatsby' by F. Scott Fitzgerald, '1984' by George Orwell.

patterns: Can you recommend a non-fiction book?
responses: Of course! Here are some popular non-fiction books: 'Becoming' by Michelle Obama, 'Sapiens: A Brief History of Humankind' by Yuval Noah Harari, 'The Subtle Art of Not Giving a F*ck' by Mark Manson.

patterns: Can you suggest a best-selling book?
responses: Absolutely! Here are some of our best-selling books: 'The Silent Patient' by Alex Michaelides, 'Where the Crawdads Sing' by Delia Owens, 'Educated' by Tara Westover.
